root.name: NFL '95
root.description: This was the Sega Sports answer to the growing Madden series. The game feature the 1994 rosters and Joe Montana on the cover of the game. It was available for both the Sega Genesis and Sega GameGear.An interesting note, there is no commentary in the game, but there is the occasional line of dialogue from a PA Announcer. Players would hear the occasional "TOUCHDOWN!" It's also key to mention that even though the game featured rosters from 1994, you had the option to start a season with the '93 and '92 rosters as well.NFL 95 also featured classic teams as well as "all star teams" based on regions of the country.The game featured Free Agency, Create-A-Player (which allowed players to create a 21-year-old rookie and adjust his vital statistic.
